meaning: A motor vehicle for transporting large numbers of people along roads.
A long walk.
example: The tenants were not happy with the rent hike.

meaning: One who hikes, especially frequently.
An activity that one enjoys doing in one's spare time.
example: I like to collect stamps from different countries as a hobby.

meaning: Lacking a permanent place of residence.
example: Whenever I pass the park, I see the homeless people sleeping on the benches.

meaning: Made at home.
example: a homemade chicken casserole

meaning: Someone who owns a house
Work that is done at home, especially school exercises assigned by a teacher.
example: You must do your homework before you can watch television.

meaning: (manner) In an honest manner.
example: He answered the questions honestly.

meaning: The act or service of welcoming, receiving, hosting, or entertaining guests.
example: Please thank our hosts for their hospitality during the week that we stayed.

meaning: A telephone line that is always staffed and able to give immediate assistance.
example: If you've got any problems with the product, ring our hotline.

meaning: Something produced each hour.
example: She never reads her hourly report, but let her hourlies be fifteen minutes late and she raises a ruckus.

meaning: The person in charge of a house; a housekeeper or innkeeper.
Someone who owns a house as a place of residence; a householder.
example: She was their third housekeeper, but after a month or so she also gave up.

meaning: Dampness, especially that of the air.
Affected by hunger; desiring of food; having a physical need for food.
example: My kids go to bed hungry every night because I haven't got any money.

meaning: A severe tropical cyclone in the North Atlantic Ocean, Caribbean Sea, Gulf of Mexico, or in the eastern North Pacific off the west coast of Mexico, with winds of 119 km/h (74 miles per hour) or greater accompanied by rain, lightning, and thunder that sometimes moves into temperate latitudes.
The science of health, its promotion and preservation.
example: Hygiene is an important consideration in places where food is prepared.

meaning: A dessert made from frozen sweetened cream or a similar substance, usually flavoured.
example: Strawberries are particularly delicious with ice cream.

meaning: Pertaining to, resembling, or abounding in ice; cold; frosty.
In an ideal way; perfectly.
example: Ideally, we would have one textbook per student, but unfortunately some of you will have to share.

meaning: The act of identifying, or proving to be the same.
example: Much education and experience is required for proper identification of bird species

meaning: Contrary to logic; lacking sense or sound reasoning.
example: I received an illogical reply and that left me standing there feeling confused.

meaning: The act of immigrating; the passing or coming into a country of which one is not native born for the purpose of permanent residence.
The striking of one body against another; collision.
example: The hatchet cut the wood on impact.

meaning: Restless and intolerant of delays.
example: impatient speeches or replies

meaning: (grammar) The grammatical mood expressing an order (see jussive). In English, the imperative form of a verb is the same as that of the bare infinitive.
example: The verbs in sentences like "Do it!" and "Say what you like!" are in the imperative.

meaning: Not appropriate; not suitable for the situation, time, or place.
example: It is inappropriate to burp at a formal dinner.

meaning: Including (almost) everything within its scope.
example: an inclusive list of data formats

meaning: The act of coming in; arrival.
example: Incoming tides cause a tidal bore in many rivers.

meaning: Something incomplete.
example: He got four incompletes out of five courses last semester.

meaning: The quality of being inconvenient.
To bring upon oneself or expose oneself to, especially something inconvenient, harmful, or onerous; to become liable or subject to
A pointer or index that indicates something.
An indirect cost.
As individuals, separately, independently
Situated in, or designed to be used in, or carried on within, the interior of a building.
example: These fireworks are not for indoor use!

meaning: An act of inducting.
A person who cannot or does not work efficiently.
example: Celery is an inefficient food.

meaning: Low in price
A lack of experience.
example: I failed to get the job due to inexperience.
